metadata.title: CVE-2020-15365 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: LibRaw before 0.20-Beta3 has an out-of-bounds write in parse_exif() inmetadata\exif_gps.cpp via an unrecognized AtomName and a zero value oftiff_nifds.

criterions.comment: ufraw package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
